"},{"id":9,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561197999059553 (-=KCSB=- KG)","alts":null,"description":"hey and well ban was long long time ago  right now 438 days and well i know i was stupid and i dont even know why i did it  maybe i was just stupid  i learned what i did wrong and i know i dont want to scamm <.< right now i dont trade much with strange people i only trade with close friends but i am banned on scrap.tf and marketplace.tf  at the time i was banned i was a donater of scrap.tf and now i cant use it anymore there are many websites i cant use anymore and i hate myself for this shit i did around 440 days ago the next reason is i cant play anymore on your servers without getting kicked when it is full i love the orange_x3 server but i always get kicked i feel bad for the shit i did at this time and i feel bad for the people i did it too but i dont want the tag anymore its a shame for my soul and for my heart its a shame in my life i mean playing tf2 is a part of my life  i play it since many years and have over 6100 hours in the game  i love the game and the people but they hate me cuz of the tag and i can understand it i hate myself to for the tag and for the shit i did at this time now after many days i may see the chance to get a downgrade or a remove so i can use scrap.tf or marketplace.tf again and can play on any server i want my profil and backpack will be always public so you can guys can see everything i did  the reason why i am that late with the appeal  i was just nervouse and i dont want to fail  i hope you can understand it and i will get a downgrade or a remove tf2 is just my love :c   ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":313,"locked":1,"creator_id":50,"modificator_id":50,"created_at":"17.08.2016 22:57:33","updated_at":"2016-08-23 23:41:06","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":23,"type":"Mistake - Admin misunderstood evidence or made a mistake","appellant":"76561198314496364 (Mama Ama Kriminal)","alts":null,"description":"I want to report fogs administrator opinion because he made mistake!! I got banned for nothing . When im inviting him on steam hes rejecting me i type in his comment that i need help about it but hes deleting it, i posted a topic and he rejected it for nothif :@ hes last reply was that selling accounts are not allowed and i didnot sold any accounts!!!! Also he said that give all accounts links wich i am using or used and i gave it and he banned me for nothing like a first one Just i want to ask Why is he rejecting me or banning me im giving all proofs saying that i call me in skype or use teamviewer i can show it live if he wants of course but he dont care about it !!! He banned me for nothing i mnot scammer!!!! And he gave me a title " fog scammer" i heared about fog yesterday lol -_- Just give me a reason banning me for nothing and rejecting my appeals?? I willnot stop posting appeals because i got ban for nothing!! www.f-o-g.trade/appeals/21 www.f-o-g.treade/appeals/22 [MENTION=2]Tio José das Vacas[/MENTION]‍ ","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":248,"locked":1,"creator_id":90,"modificator_id":90,"created_at":"10.09.2016 18:04:22","updated_at":"2016-09-10 18:30:19","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":33,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198190270679 (DEJVVV CSGOPot.com)","alts":null,"description":"Hello i am here again after 163 days.In recent days, I am still pondering what I have caused.And if you still think about the same is not good so I decided to write to you if there is any solution to remove the ban.I want to be better human in this community as i was before.My account caused me great joy.I decided to confess that what I have done. I can do anything for my account. [b]I never scammed anyone but i was lying-[/b]that's my problem :) And sorry for my english :)","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":58,"locked":1,"creator_id":108,"modificator_id":108,"created_at":"21.09.2016 19:34:16","updated_at":"2016-09-21 21:01:28","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":39,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198258644332 (snbi.)","alts":null,"description":"Hello, my name is snbi. About 4 months ago, I was involved in helping a friend with brokering one of his 12 key unusuals, in which I scammed him. You can go and see this appeal I made the day after in which it got denied: http://forums.f-o-g.eu/threads/12184-steamrep-tag-removal-downgrade-ban-appeal-snbi.html I'm just here to hopefully get a downgrade from my "scammer" tag, to a "caution" tag. The only reason I'm asking for this is because I don't want to keep this negativity on my steamrep/other trading websites for any longer. Now I cannot change what I did in the past, which was foolish, but I can change change the future by making good decisions and trying to have a decent reputation among the community. I recently decided to come back to playing TF2 and start trying to trade again because I had quit due to having to focus more on my classes, home stuff, etc... Anyway, my point is that I have learned my lesson from scamming my friend, and would like to ask one of the moderators to hopefully view this post and downgrade my tag from "scammer", to "caution" Thank you for taking the time to read this for whoever got assigned this appeal. [b]-Snbi[/b]","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":77,"locked":1,"creator_id":120,"modificator_id":120,"created_at":"01.10.2016 00:20:25","updated_at":"2016-10-01 15:20:44","state":"Archived","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":40,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198016938478 (GizMo)","alts":null,"description":"It has been about a year now since this happened and i made a big mistake from that. I have changed a lot and I feel bad for the person(s) i have tried scamming in the past. I have lost friends because of this and it was so long ago and i was dumb back then and didnt know what i was doing. I will never try scamming ever again i have seen the bad things that can happen from what i used to do. Have my word "I will never scam again in the C:S Community or anything on Steam". Thanks. - GizMo","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/5aed3b1fca4acca90102acgec770accf https://files.f-o-g.eu/b0ef8g4g145a8eee43af4615b24bf54d https://files.f-o-g.eu/89184c09fgedaa13dg1122cdcde502b2 https://files.f-o-g.eu/0cgfg4a5369e826e6847df1bb4ab1g84 https://files.f-o-g.eu/da93gacd2fb3caf6g343edfeadb5063b ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":232,"locked":1,"creator_id":121,"modificator_id":121,"created_at":"04.10.2016 07:45:38","updated_at":"2016-11-04 18:49:32","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":44,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198158102694 (Marakesh)","alts":null,"description":"[i]I realise I made a big mistake by impersonating a CS:GO Pin admin, I wouldn't ever do something like that again. I would like to be unbanned, I learnt my lesson of trying to scam someone, I never scammed anyone, that was my only and failed one. Have already made an appeal, didn't get approved, I still have hope...I cannot use reddit, csgolounge, any trade servers to trade my items on there because of the ban... All my alts got banned aswell, I never use them, forgot the password to them all. I really can't trade with the steamrep mark, I hope you can understand me. Will provide all the evidence from the time period when I got reported. This happened 269 days ago. I will give my promise that I will never cause problems related to Steam ever again. I'm very sorry once and for all. Made a big mistake doing that. It's been almost one full year with the tag.  I can't get over the fact that I'm marked on here.  I want to apologize to advicebanana especially. I'm very sorry for causing problems.[/i]","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/0cfe7476e7ca29gf4bd8eab52a7cga75 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":153,"locked":1,"creator_id":83,"modificator_id":83,"created_at":"08.10.2016 23:30:48","updated_at":"2016-10-09 10:34:43","state":"Archived","assignee":"

A while ago I got scammed by someone using the same scam, so I tried doing it to others.","evidence":"I never got any money from this scam, and I don't plan on scamming again. I just got mad because lost money, but the script is now taken down (screenshots). "},{"id":53,"type":"Mistake - Admin misunderstood evidence or made a mistake","appellant":"76561198178097475 (=D ♥)","alts":null,"description":"Ok, well so i changed my name to i7|Jing just to troll my IRL friend that i was a steamrep middleman. If its needed i can take my friend in to this and you guys cna ask him aswell. "},{"id":56,"type":"Missing - Evidence is missing or not enough","appellant":"76561198158605267 (EmeralMage)","alts":null,"description":"I did not know you had reported me, but I really did ask someone to trade so I had believed you had reported me. Also, if I didn't attempt to scam anyone I just copied your profile then why would I be banned for attempted scammer? You wouldn't know if I attempted to scam, I mean yes, I did trade someone but it was no scam. If this is all a good reason to ban someone then tell me why this person is not banned for impersonating a youtuber? http://steamcommunity.com/id/nickbunyum. It even says he has played as [CSGOLotto] Bot #59! And you ban me! What is this nonsense?","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":130,"locked":1,"creator_id":152,"modificator_id":152,"created_at":"26.10.2016 18:55:49","updated_at":"2016-10-26 19:28:23","state":"Archived","assignee":"

"},{"id":60,"type":"Other / another reason ","appellant":"76561198248557120 (Wolf)","alts":null,"description":"Hello. *When* A month or 2 back i was heavy boxing with a guy named "Killer". *Where and what* He invited me to a server to heavy box. If i remember correctly he wagered his pool party taunt not his genuine ap-sap, but that's what i tihnk. My ping at the time was around 150 to 200 i was lagging and tried telling him that i had lag but he ignored. I didn't wanna leave but i didn't want to keep fighting due to my ping, so i didn't know what to do. *At the end* I lost and i refused to give him my items because i was telling him that i was lagging. After that i change my name 'cause i sorta felt bad and joined back. Then i tried to give him my items but due to my ping i kept trying to drag/double click them but they wouldn't go in. He thought i was lying and filed a report against me. I do not have photo evidence due to i had not uploaded the screenshots. Goodbye.","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":107,"locked":1,"creator_id":162,"modificator_id":162,"created_at":"01.11.2016 15:00:37","updated_at":"2016-12-20 15:21:16","state":"Archived","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":61,"type":"Change of Heart","appellant":"76561198158605267 (EmeralMage)","alts":null,"description":"[u][b]You were reported because?[/b][/u] I was reported for impersonating SteamRep admins and the report for me was read and accepted. I have not met and personally talked with any of the admins but I do not believe that matter the most. I personally believe [u]defraud[/u] was not the word I would use, as I had not asked anyone for items to "Check", "Borrow", or "Use for a moment"! I will give you the benifit of the doubt, because there is no way to tell if I did ask for items or not. [b][u]What makes you feel different?[/u][/b] Honestly I really haven't attempted to defraud, as said before, but I still confirm this as a "Change of Heart" appeal. I would consider it a different feel because I do not see anytime in my future impersonating an admin. If I do have my account change to impersonate or attempt scam I would gladly be reported while I sort out the issue. Weather it was me being hacked, or my family interacting with my computer I would gladly like to know what happened. I will most likely start recording soon if I can get my quality better (If I get a way to contact whoever is reading) and if I record I would obviously not attempt scam in my videos. I know how getting scammed feels as my friend on steam (DuderJ) was scammed for his [u]whole[/u] inventory and now only has a few skins left. I still understand how impersonating admins is an offense so I understand being banned on SteamRep [b][u]I don't see any [real] proof[/u][/b] The only proof I can give you is a screenshot of my page, (as well as my friends blank inv.) as you already have my steam id and you can easily check my profile to see how I am doing. Notice! I will always keep my "Working on my +SteamRep ban..." on my profile until I get an appeal approved. My last appeal was denied and my other one was not assessed yet. I will not spam this page with appeals anymore I will wait before my next one if this is not accepted. As always I thank the person(s) reading this and might meet you again.","evidence":"https://files.f-o-g.eu/f58a72gadebd0ea43eb7703a43851af9 https://files.f-o-g.eu/e43fb7a3c0d98g78db59814d19131e22 ","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":141,"locked":1,"creator_id":152,"modificator_id":152,"created_at":"01.11.2016 21:39:56","updated_at":"2016-11-01 21:49:12","state":"Archived","assignee":"
Unassigned
","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
"},{"id":62,"type":"Other / another reason ","appellant":"76561198158605267 (EmeralMage)","alts":null,"description":"I HAVE BEEN FALSIFIED REPORTED AND I AM ANGRY FOR HOW I HAVE BEEN ADRESSED! [u][b]FIRST OFF[/b][/u] how have a been reported for attempt to defraud if you have no real proof that I attempted to defraud. Yes! I did copy their profiles but did I attempt to defraud. Because defraud means to "illegally obtain money from (someone) by deception" DID i attempt or succeed in that process? [b][u]SECOND OFF[/u][/b] How is my report denied for lying. Once again you have no proof that I did [u]not[/u] trade with this guy for his doppler karambit. [b]If[/b] I did do that then I understand my report> but I would not have lied.[b]If[/b] I did [u]not[/u] do that then I did not attempt to defraud! So I really want an explanation because I really get the good side of the matter (A win - win) [b][u]THE END[/u][/b] Hope you enjoyed! Next time think... please...","evidence":"","assignee_id":null,"state_id":7,"views":109,"locked":1,"creator_id":152,"modificator_id":152,"created_at":"02.11.2016 01:08:55","updated_at":"2016-11-02 18:12:58","state":"Archived","assignee":"

","last_reply":"
Tio José das Vacas
